etymologies: mid 19th century: from French salpe, based on Greek salpē ‘fish’

definitions: a free-swimming marine invertebrate related to the sea squirts, with a transparent barrel-shaped body.

notes.text: Several genera in the class Thaliacea, subphylum Urochordata

shortDefinitions: free-swimming marine invertebrate related to sea squirts, with transparent barrel-shaped body
